title: Happy Kuh
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar
description: A 100% vegetarian/vegan gourmet restaurant, the first of its kind in this city. Located inside the Q Resort. Offers specialties using a diverse array of regional products.
